response.overview: This year Braaap Films 15 “Rise” provides its viewers with another great backcountry adventure.  We continue to cover the progression of Reagan Sieg and Brock Hoyer attacking the backcountry on the Timbersled mountain horse snow bikes.  Morgan Gamache returns to Braaap Films with a great presentation of his skills in the backcountry with some huge re-entries and some great all around talent.  As always Braaap Films brings you what’s current and exciting-- insane big drops, lots of huge airtime, technical big mountain riding and fresh new talent from the backcountry snowmobiling industry.
response.tagline: This year Braaap Films 15 “Rise” provides its viewers with another great backcountry adventure.We continue to cover the progression of Reagan Sieg and Brock Hoyer attacking the backcountry on the Timbersled mountain horse snow bikes.
response.title: Braaap 15: Rise
